description: Lufthansa - Mobile Boarding Pass - Flight LHxxxx (SSS-DDD)

barcode.message: <M=Format Code><Legs indicator=1><First Name ie. WILL>/<Last Name ie. SMITH>       <E=Electronic Ticket Indicator><ABC123=Lufthansa Booking/PNR Code> <From City Airport IATA Code i.e. CGN><To City Airport IATA Code i.e. HKG><LH=Operating Carrier Code> <Flight No> <Date of Flight (Julien Cal) ie. 228=16th Aug><Compartment Code i.e. M=Economy)><Seat No ie.045F><Check-in Seq No. (max 5 digits) i.e. 0025>  <Passenger Status 3=?><Field Size of the following variable size fied in hex. ie. 55(hex)=85(dec)><> =
-char in ASCII unicode escape encoded used in JSON;

=Beginning of Version No><1 digit Version No i.e. 2><2 digit length of variable field in hex. I.e 18(hex)=24(dec)><1 digit passenger description, ie 0><Source of check-in, ie. K=(strangly) Kiosk check-in><Source of Boarding Pass issuance, ie the letter O=Airport Agent printed><4-digi date of issue of Boarding Passe (Julian Date) ie 2308=2012Nov04><Document Type.B=Boarding Pass><Airline designator of Boarding Pass issuer, ie LH>            nn<ETIX No>  LH LH <Miles & More Frequent Flyer No> W*12344568901 /*unknown but different number then 12345...01*/  LHS
barcode.altText: BN<Check-in Seq No. (max 5 digits) i.e. 0025 see also above>   LH<Flight No with 0s omitted>

backFields.value: Lufthansa wishes you a pleasant flight.
Please be at the boarding gate in time - Your seat may be reassigned otherwise.

backFields.label: Baggage Drop Off:
backFields.value: Term. 2, Bag Drop Kiosk, Departure Level no later than: 21:15 o´clock

backFields.label: Change seat or cancel Check-in
backFields.value:
In case you change your flight plans on short notice or you would like to choose another seat, please cancel or change your checked-in flight here: http://mobile.lufthansa.com/lp/cki/?ticketnr=<ETIX No>&fname=<First Name i.e. Will>&name=<Family Name i.e. Smith>.

You have access to your Passenger Receipt at www.lufthansa.com up to 30 days after beginning your journey.

backFields.label: Liability
backFields.value: For travel under this ticket the Montreal Convention or the Warsaw Convention may be applicable and these Conventions limit the liability of carriers in respect of loss of or damage to baggage and for delay. In the case of death or bodily injury no financial limits apply under the Montreal Convention and for European Community carriers; for damage up to the equivalent of 113.100 SDR carriers are liable regardless of negligence.

backFields.label: Dangerous Items
backFields.value:
You may not take these items along:
For safety reasons, the laws of all countries prohibit the transportation of the following items in your checked-in or carry-on baggage: Briefcases with built-in alarm devices; Explosives, fireworks, flares; Pressurized containers containing irritant gases, self-defense sprays, camping gas; Containers with flammable liquids such as lighter fuel, paint, varnish, cleaning agents; Items that ignite easily, such as matches; Substances that emit flammable gases upon contact with water; Oxidizing substances, such as bleaching powder, peroxides; Poisonous (toxic) and infectious substances, such as quicksilver, bacteria and virus cultures; Radioactive materials and items; Corrosive substances, such as acids, alkalis, wet cell batteries; Strongly magnetic materials. Lighter is only allowed when carried on oneself.

backFields.label: EU passenger rights
backFields.value: If you are denied boarding or if your flight is cancelled or delayed for at least two hours, ask at the check-in counter or boarding gate for the text stating your rights, particularly with regard to compensation and assistance.

backFields.label: Contact addresses
backFields.value:
Deutsche Lufthansa AG
Flughafen-Bereich West
D-60546 Frankfurt/Main

Telephone: +49-69-69 60*
(Mon-Fri: 08:00 hrs - 17:00 hrs)

Internet: www.lufthansa.com

*Please only call for administrative purposes. For all other queries, please use the “Contact” section of http://mobile.lufthansa.com/lp/cts/.
